A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Came into the theater with high expectations following TFA only to come out disappointed. This movie had the same plot points as Empire and Return of the Jedi\, the characters were under developed\, and most importantly\, this did not feel like a SW film. TLJ had a weak and boring plot\, but there being so many storylines going on simultaneously (Rey\, Luke\, Leia\, Kylo\, etc) made this movie go back and forth too much. Overall this is not the movie most audiences were expecting following JJ Abrams' brilliant episode 7. I am looking forward to how these issues are fixed in the next episode and will optimistically attend regardless.
